title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1661/86 of 29 May 1986 fixing for the 1986/87 marketing year the reference prices for lemons
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1661/86
of 29 May 1986
fixing for the 1986/87 marketing year the reference prices for lemons
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1986/87 marketing year, the reference prices for fresh lemons falling within subheading 08.02 C of the Common Customs Tariff, expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- June: 52,64
- July and August: 58,03
- September: 53,29
- October: 47,66
- November to April: 45,00
- May: 45,58.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 May 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
